mapper.select: select name from item_category where name=#{name} and parent_id != 0
select * from item_category where id=#{id} and is_parent=1
mapper.update: update item_category set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update item_category set name=#{name},sort=#{sort} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select i.c_id,i.id,i.title,i.sell_point,i.price,i.num,i.img_path,i.status from item i,item_category c where i.c_id=c.id and i.status=1 and c.parent_id=#{parentId} order by i.createtime desc limit 0,5
select i.c_id,i.id,i.title,i.sell_point,i.price,i.num,i.img_path,i.status from item i,item_category c where i.c_id=c.id and i.status=1 and c.parent_id=#{parentId} order by i.createtime desc limit 0,5
